item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 5–11 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 4–5 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti (ECR): 2–3 seats
  • Venstre (ALDE): 3–4 seats
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 1 seats
  • Liberal Alliance (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Alternativet (—): 0–1 seats
  • Radikale Venstre (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Kristendemokraterne (EPP): 0 seats
  • Nye Borgerlige (—): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 5–11 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Kristendemokraterne (EPP): 0.4–1.5%
  • Nye Borgerlige (—): 0.9–2.5%
